ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron looked at Dinobot with a slight look of concern in her eyes when his wounds began to bleed anew. She had not realized Dinobot was wounded. Tavatron

Tavatron looked at Dinobot with a slight look of concern in her eyes when 
his wounds began to bleed anew. She had not realized Dinobot was wounded. 
Tavatron dismissed the concern as quickly as it had come to her, if he was 
seriously injured he would tell her. Then again...

Tavatron's worry was finally put to rest when Dinobot transformed. If he was 
well enough to transform then he was alright. However, when she spoke her 
latest 'insult' she began to worry again. It wasn't like Dinobot to get so 
stressed out over a simple word, even if it wasn't spoken in the most 
positive of senses.

She dropped into a very low crouch when Dinobot glared at her, drawing back 
her head and gazing up at him. She knew that if he got angry enough he could 
easily rip her in two, and no amount of training would be able to save her. 
Tavatron's look  than became one of curiousity, Dinobot didn't look so angry 
anymore, but he wasn't exactly looking friendly either. She raised an 
eyridge and slowly rose from her crouched position until she was standing 
upright again. Tavatron snarled then smiled when she saw that Dinobot was 
back in the joking spirit again, however she made it a point to ask him 
about his reaction later, when he couldn't dodge the question, and when she 
had a more readily available route of escape:

"I'm a WHAT?!" Tavatron said with mock anger. She was really angry, but the 
look on her face would have made even her own mother think otherwise:

"Tavatron, MAXIMIZE!"

Tavatron transformed and caught up with Dinobot just outside the War Room. 
She gave him a quick smile before pushing open the door:

"You think you're so smart, don't you?" Tavatron held the door open for 
Dinobot, waiting for him to enter.
